Reference

Package

Package details

hyetor

hyetor: Analyzes fixed interval precipitation records.

Preprocessing

Functions that can be used to preprocess precipitation timeseries

hyet_create()

Create an hyetograph

hyet_fill()

Fill an hyetograph with missing date values

hyet_aggregate()

Aggregate an hyetograph using a predefined time-step

hyet_split()

Split an hyetograph to independent rainstorms

Analysis

Funtions that analyze precipitation timeseries

hyet_erosivity()

Compute rainfall erosivity from an hyetograph

hyet_intensities()

Compute maximum rolling intensities from an hyetograph

hyet_missing()

Compute the missing values ratio of an hyetograph per month and year

hyet_uch()

Create Unitless Cumulative Hyetographs (UCH)

Datasets

The internal datasets of the package

prec5min

Five minutes precipitation time series
